General.Name: NACON SASU
General.Description: Nacon S.A. designs and distributes games and gaming accessories in France and internationally. The company offers accessories, including headsets, microphones, controllers, RIG, keyboards, mice, audio, USB cables, optical cables, car adapter, rechargeable batteries, charging stations, and console accessories. It also develops and publishes video games in various categories, such as action and adventure, racing, sport, and simulation. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is based in Fretin, France. Nacon S.A. is a subsidiary of BigBen Interactive SA.
General.Address: 396/466, Rue de la Voyette, Fretin, France, 59273
